trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en abstrakt klasse for kontrolltypene som tillater flere elementer som skal velges.

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the MultiSelector class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: Når du avledet en klasse fra klassen MultiSelector, angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>egenskapen `true` å tillate flere valg i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>kan ikke startes direkte er en abstrakt klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny transaksjon for valg.

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdateSelectedItems method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdateSelectedItems metoden angir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>metoden angir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> når denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om flere elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> kan velge om gangen.

trans-unit.source: Set the CanSelectMultipleItems property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CanSelectMultipleItems til `true` i en avledet klasse å tillate flere valget for klassen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis flere elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> kan være valgte samtidig; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de valgte elementene til den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>til `false` og oppdateres av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>metoden angir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> når denne metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> utføres i en bulk oppdatering av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>metoden angir IsUpdatingSelectedItems `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>metoden angir IsUpdatingSelectedItems `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> utføres i en bulk oppdatering av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>samlingen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Velger alle elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementene den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> som er valgt.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the SelectedItems collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>er `false`, du kan ikke legge til mer enn ett element i samlingen SelectedItems.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å gjøre dette vil føre til at et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> som er valgt.

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Opphever merkingen av alle elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden uavhengig om <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>er `true` eller `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>
